Title: Cart Total Calculation
Precondition:
User is logged in
- Cart contains at least one product with price and quantity
Steps:
1. Open the shopping cart page
2. Add a product to the cart
3. Modify the quantity using +/– buttons
4. Remove a product
5. Add another product
Expected Result:
- Total = (Price × Quantity) for each product
- Total updates instantly after any change
- Total is displayed clearly at the bottom of the cart page
Actual Result:
Each product’s total was calculated correctly based on its price and quantity
Total amount updated immediately after increasing, decreasing, or removing items
Total was shown clearly at the bottom in bold text, easy to read
